src:
WATCH: Prince Harry at the Rugby World Cup final

02 Nov 2019, 12:27

Cape Town - The Duke of Sussex congratulates Rugby World Cup hosts Japan on holding the tournament and wishes England luck in the final against South Africa.

WATCH THE VIDEO HERE:
